backend/main.mo: Defines core data types and maps for salons, bookings, images, and user profiles, plus Swiss salon seeding and authorization/storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing required frontend file overwrites, behavior preservation, and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short human-written summaries for many frontend React components, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme colors with OKLCH variables, dark mode values, and global reset/utility rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Minimal wrapper that renders and exports AppV1.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large React file implementing the V54 manifesto UI with intro sequence, Swiss search logic, profession presets, and full app interactions.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Empty file placeholder for AuthHeader component.
Empty file placeholder for CreateSalonForm component.
frontend/src/components/MemberCard.tsx: Empty file placeholder for MemberCard component.
frontend/src/components/MonopolyModeSwit: Empty file placeholder for MonopolyModeSwitch component.
frontend/src/components/MotionButton.tsx: Empty file placeholder for MotionButton component.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Empty file placeholder for PremiumBadge component.
frontend/src/components/Pressable.tsx: Empty file placeholder for Pressable component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file placeholder for ProfileSetupModal component.
frontend/src/components/ProSalonWizard.t: Empty file placeholder for ProSalonWizard component.
frontend/src/components/ProStudioCreator: Empty file placeholder for ProStudioCreator component.
frontend/src/components/RevenueChart.tsx: Empty file placeholder for RevenueChart component.
frontend/src/components/SalonListSection: Empty file placeholder for SalonListSection component.
frontend/src/components/VipDashboard.tsx: Empty file placeholder for VipDashboard component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching a backend actor based on II identity, with access-control initialization and dependent query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus extensive custom variables, dark mode tokens, utilities, and animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with ReactDOM, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing text snippets based on salon form data using category, type, tags, and city.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with extended color tokens, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing reset history, architectural direction, known issues, and versions.
